[P1 Infinite Health]
580F0000 04740928
780F0000 000007F4
640F0000 00000000 000000C8

[P2 Infinite Health]
580F0000 0473A510
780F0000 000007F4
640F0000 00000000 000000C8

[Level Studs]
580F0000 0474c860
780F0000 0001d1d8
640F0000 00000000 000F4240

Note: Use only each level code in the corresponding
level to get 1000 studs less than whats needed for
true villian.
